imdb.plot outline: Malik, a well spoken and articulate young man earns his living by creating lavish illusions for the eclectic minds. Performing these acts of dis-illusionment provides a monetary fix, but further cements the world of illusions he has created for himself. Having been permanently traumatized by the physical and verbal abuse of his upbringing, Malik seeks solace through his re-enactments, which in turn, deeper his pain and grief. This show follows his journey of self-discovery, while providing well thought out plot twists and character banter, along the way.
imdb.title: The Dis-Illusionist
